metro.GameScreen

Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
      • metro.GameScreen.MainMenu

  • public class MainMenu
extends GameScreen
    The main menu is the first menu you'll see after starting the game. It provides some basic options like start, exit and settings.
    Author:
    Hauke
